ai_perfect_reasons: Geographic flow optimized: Logical progression from Bangalore to Hampi, then Gokarna, minimizing backtracking.
Budget adherence: Total cost strictly within the user's specified budget range.
Interest alignment: Itinerary perfectly balances user's interests in 'Nature' and 'Temples' across both destinations.
Realistic pacing: Mix of moderate and action-packed days with sufficient travel buffers.
Budget travel focus: Prioritizes affordable accommodation, local food, and cost-effective transport options.
Detailed and actionable: Every activity includes specific names, costs, and practical tips for easy execution.
cultural_etiquette: Always remove your shoes before entering temples and homes.
Dress modestly when visiting religious sites (shoulders and knees covered).
Use your right hand for eating and giving/receiving items.
Ask for permission before photographing people, especially women.
Bargain respectfully in local markets, but not in fixed-price shops.
image_keyword: Hampi Vittala Temple Stone Chariot and Gokarna Om Beach
important_tips: Download offline Google Maps for Hampi and Gokarna areas before arriving.
Learn a few basic phrases in Kannada (e.g., 'Namaste,' 'Dhanyavaad' - Thank you) to enhance local interactions.
Stay hydrated by drinking plenty of water, especially in Hampi's heat.
Be mindful of your belongings in crowded areas and during overnight travel.
Inform family/friends of your itinerary and check in regularly.
Carry a photocopy of your ID proof (Aadhar/Passport) and keep originals safe.

accommodation.booking_tip: Book Sleeper Class (SL) tickets on IRCTC website/app at least 60 days in advance for best availability.
accommodation.name: Overnight Train
accommodation.why_this: Saves a night's accommodation cost and maximizes travel time efficiently.

activities.description: Board the Hampi Express from KSR Bengaluru City Junction. Find your sleeper class berth and prepare for an overnight journey to Hospet, the gateway to Hampi.
activities.google_maps_search_query: KSR Bengaluru City Junction, Majestic, Bengaluru, Karnataka, India
activities.how_to_reach: Metro to Majestic Station — ₹40, 20 min. Walk to KSR Bengaluru City Junction.
activities.local_secret: Carry your own snacks and water; train pantry options are limited. Secure your luggage with a chain and lock for peace of mind.
activities.tips: Arrive at least 30 minutes before departure. Confirm your platform number on arrival.
activities.why_this_fits: This overnight train journey is a budget-friendly way to cover distance, saving on accommodation costs and allowing you to wake up near your first destination, ready to explore ancient temples.

itinerary.afternoon_summary: Enjoy a relaxed afternoon before heading to the railway station.
itinerary.daily_weather_tip: Prepare for a cool night on the train; carry a light blanket or shawl.
itinerary.evening_summary: Board your overnight train, settling in for a comfortable journey to Hospet.
itinerary.morning_summary: Prepare for your overnight journey to Hampi, ensuring all essentials are packed.
itinerary.notes: Ensure all train tickets are confirmed and downloaded. Pack light for easy movement.
itinerary.theme: Journey to the Land of Boulders

accommodation.booking_tip: Book directly via phone or email for better rates and to confirm availability, especially during peak season.
accommodation.name: Mowgli Guesthouse
accommodation.why_this: Budget-friendly, centrally located near major attractions, and offers a vibrant backpacker atmosphere.

activities.activity: Arrival at Hospet & Transfer to Hampi
activities.description: Arrive at Hospet Junction. Take an auto-rickshaw to Hampi Bazaar, check into your pre-booked guesthouse, and freshen up.
activities.how_to_reach: Auto-rickshaw from Hospet Junction — ₹250, 30 min. Walk to guesthouse.
activities.local_secret: Negotiate auto-rickshaw fares from Hospet to Hampi; aim for ₹200-250. Many guesthouses near Hampi Bazaar offer early check-in for a small fee.
activities.tips: Have small change ready for the auto-rickshaw. Confirm guesthouse location beforehand.
activities.why_this_fits: Efficient arrival and quick check-in allow you to maximize your time exploring Hampi's temples and nature.

activities.description: Explore the magnificent Virupaksha Temple, an active Shiva temple with a towering gopuram, intricate carvings, and a unique pinhole camera effect. Witness the morning rituals.
activities.how_to_reach: Walk from Hampi Bazaar — ₹0, 5 min.
activities.local_secret: Visit early morning (around 8 AM) to witness the temple elephant Lakshmi's bath in the river, a unique cultural experience.
activities.tips: Dress modestly. Remove shoes before entering. Photography is allowed but be respectful.
activities.why_this_fits: As a temple enthusiast, you'll appreciate the living history and architectural grandeur of this ancient, continuously worshipped temple, a core part of Hampi's spiritual heritage.

activities.description: Enjoy a delicious South Indian thali or other local dishes at Mango Tree, a popular riverside restaurant known for its relaxed ambiance and fresh food.
activities.google_maps_search_query: Mango Tree Restaurant, Hampi, Karnataka, India
activities.how_to_reach: Walk from Virupaksha Temple — ₹0, 10 min.
activities.local_secret: Try their fresh fruit juices and lassis – perfect for cooling down in Hampi's heat. The banana flower curry is a local specialty.
activities.tips: It can get busy; try to arrive slightly before peak lunch hours.
activities.why_this_fits: A budget-friendly and authentic culinary experience, allowing you to refuel with local flavors amidst Hampi's natural beauty.

activities.description: Climb Hemakuta Hill, dotted with numerous small temples and pavilions, offering panoramic views of Hampi Bazaar and Virupaksha Temple. Visit the monolithic Sasivekalu Ganesha and Kadalekalu Ganesha statues.
activities.how_to_reach: Walk from Mango Tree Restaurant — ₹0, 15 min.
activities.local_secret: The best time for photos from Hemakuta Hill is late afternoon when the light is softer. Look for the ancient Jain temples on the hill.
activities.tips: Wear sturdy shoes for climbing. Carry water.
activities.why_this_fits: Combines your interest in temples with stunning natural viewpoints, offering excellent photography opportunities of Hampi's unique landscape.

activities.activity: Coracle Ride & Sunset at Tungabhadra River
activities.description: Experience a traditional coracle boat ride on the Tungabhadra River, gliding past ancient ruins and lush greenery. Conclude with a mesmerizing sunset view over the boulder-strewn landscape.
activities.how_to_reach: Walk from Hemakuta Hill to the river bank near Virupaksha Temple — ₹0, 10 min.
activities.local_secret: Negotiate the coracle ride price with the boatmen; aim for ₹250-300 for a 30-45 minute ride. Ask them to spin the coracle for a fun experience.
activities.tips: Be cautious while getting in and out of the coracle. Keep your camera secure.
activities.why_this_fits: A unique nature experience that offers a different perspective of Hampi's ruins and a tranquil end to a day of exploration, perfect for nature lovers.

itinerary.afternoon_summary: Discover the unique boulder landscape and ancient Ganesha statues.
itinerary.daily_weather_tip: Wear light, breathable clothing and a hat. Sunscreen is essential as Hampi gets very hot.
itinerary.evening_summary: Enjoy a serene coracle ride on the Tungabhadra River, culminating in a breathtaking sunset.
itinerary.morning_summary: Arrive in Hampi, check into your guesthouse, and explore the iconic Virupaksha Temple.
itinerary.notes: Stay hydrated throughout the day. Wear comfortable footwear for walking on uneven terrain.

accommodation.booking_tip: Confirm your booking for the second night upon arrival to avoid any last-minute issues.
accommodation.name: Mowgli Guesthouse
accommodation.why_this: Consistent budget-friendly stay, allowing for easy access to Hampi Bazaar and river crossings.

activities.description: Visit the magnificent Vittala Temple, renowned for its musical pillars and the iconic Stone Chariot. Explore the intricate carvings and grand pavilions of this UNESCO World Heritage site.
activities.how_to_reach: Bicycle rental from Hampi Bazaar — ₹150, 20 min. Or shared auto — ₹50, 15 min.
activities.local_secret: Hire a local guide (₹1200 for half-day) at the entrance to truly understand the history and architectural marvels. They can point out hidden details and stories.
activities.tips: Wear socks as the stone floor can get very hot. Photography is permitted.
activities.why_this_fits: A must-see for temple enthusiasts, showcasing the pinnacle of Vijayanagara architecture and intricate craftsmanship, fulfilling your interest in ancient temples.

activities.description: Enjoy a simple, delicious and budget-friendly lunch at Gopi Guesthouse, known for its fresh food and friendly atmosphere, popular among backpackers.
activities.google_maps_search_query: Gopi Guesthouse & Restaurant, Hampi, Karnataka, India
activities.how_to_reach: Walk from Vittala Temple complex — ₹0, 10 min.
activities.local_secret: Their fresh fruit juices are excellent. Ask for the daily special for a truly local and economical meal.
activities.tips: It's a small place, so be prepared for a short wait during peak hours.
activities.why_this_fits: A perfect spot for a quick, affordable meal that allows you to continue your exploration of Hampi's historical sites without a long detour.

activities.activity: Zenana Enclosure, Elephant Stables & Lotus Mahal
activities.description: Explore the royal enclosure, including the Zenana Enclosure, a secluded area for royal women, the grand Elephant Stables, and the elegant Lotus Mahal, a unique Indo-Islamic architectural marvel.
activities.how_to_reach: Bicycle from Gopi Guesthouse — ₹0 (already rented), 15 min.
activities.local_secret: The Lotus Mahal's unique cooling system using water channels is fascinating; try to imagine it in action. The Elephant Stables are best viewed from a distance for their full grandeur.
activities.tips: Carry water as this area has less shade. The ticket for Vittala Temple usually includes entry here.
activities.why_this_fits: Offers a glimpse into the royal life of the Vijayanagara Empire, complementing your temple visits with historical insights and architectural diversity.

activities.description: Hike up Matanga Hill, the highest point in Hampi, for a panoramic 360-degree view of the entire ruins and the surrounding boulder landscape, especially stunning at sunset.
activities.how_to_reach: Bicycle from Zenana Enclosure — ₹0 (already rented), 10 min. Then a 30-min hike.
activities.local_secret: Start your climb at least an hour before sunset to find a good spot. The path can be rocky, so wear good shoes. Bring a headlamp for the descent.
activities.tips: The climb is moderately challenging. Avoid carrying heavy bags. Be respectful of other visitors.
activities.why_this_fits: A perfect blend of nature and scenic beauty, offering breathtaking views of Hampi's unique terrain and ancient structures, ideal for nature lovers and photographers.

itinerary.afternoon_summary: Delve into the royal enclosures, including the Zenana Enclosure and Elephant Stables.
itinerary.daily_weather_tip: Start early to beat the heat. Carry extra water and wear light layers.
itinerary.evening_summary: Hike up Matanga Hill for a spectacular sunset view over the entire Hampi landscape.
itinerary.morning_summary: Explore the iconic Vittala Temple complex and its famous Stone Chariot.
itinerary.notes: Consider hiring a local guide for the Vittala Temple complex to fully appreciate its history.

accommodation.booking_tip: Book AC Sleeper bus tickets online via RedBus or MakeMyTrip at least 3-4 weeks in advance.
accommodation.name: Overnight Bus
accommodation.why_this: Saves a night's accommodation cost and efficiently covers the distance between Hampi and Gokarna.

activities.description: Cross the Tungabhadra River by coracle to Anegundi, the 'Monkey Kingdom'. Explore its quiet streets, ancient temples, and rural charm, a contrast to Hampi's grandeur.
activities.how_to_reach: Coracle from Hampi side to Anegundi — ₹50, 10 min. Walk around Anegundi.
activities.local_secret: Visit the Durga Temple and the Pampa Sarovar. Look for local artisans making traditional crafts. The village is believed to be the birthplace of Hanuman.
activities.tips: Coracles stop operating after sunset. Be mindful of the monkeys.
activities.why_this_fits: Offers a glimpse into local village life and more ancient, less-visited temples, appealing to your interest in both nature and temples in a serene setting.

activities.description: Have a final meal in Hampi at Laughing Buddha Cafe, known for its relaxed vibe and diverse menu, offering both Indian and international options.
activities.google_maps_search_query: Laughing Buddha Cafe, Hampi, Karnataka, India
activities.how_to_reach: Walk from Hampi Bazaar — ₹0, 5 min.
activities.local_secret: Their fresh juices and pancakes are highly recommended. It's a great spot to relax by the river.
activities.tips: Enjoy the riverside view. It's a popular spot, so be prepared for a lively atmosphere.
activities.why_this_fits: A comfortable and budget-friendly spot to enjoy a last meal, reflecting the relaxed atmosphere of Hampi before transitioning to your next destination.

activities.description: Take an auto-rickshaw from Hampi Bazaar to Hospet Bus Stand to catch your overnight bus to Gokarna.
activities.google_maps_search_query: Hospet Bus Stand, Hospet, Karnataka, India
activities.how_to_reach: Auto-rickshaw from Hampi Bazaar — ₹250, 30 min.
activities.local_secret: Pre-book your auto-rickshaw from Hampi to Hospet to avoid last-minute haggling and ensure timely departure.
activities.tips: Confirm your bus departure point and time in advance. Arrive at the bus stand at least 30 minutes early.
activities.why_this_fits: Efficient transfer ensures you reach your departure point on time for the next leg of your budget-friendly journey.

activities.description: Board your pre-booked AC sleeper bus from Hospet to Gokarna. Settle into your berth for a comfortable overnight journey.
activities.google_maps_search_query: Hospet Bus Stand, Hospet, Karnataka, India
activities.how_to_reach: At Hospet Bus Stand.
activities.local_secret: Choose a reputable bus operator like VRL Travels or SRS Travels for better comfort and reliability. Carry a neck pillow for added comfort.
activities.tips: Keep your bus ticket (e-ticket or printout) handy. Confirm your boarding point with the bus operator.
activities.why_this_fits: This overnight bus journey is a practical and budget-conscious way to travel, saving on accommodation and maximizing your travel time.

itinerary.afternoon_summary: Prepare for your journey to Gokarna, transferring to Hospet for your overnight bus.
itinerary.daily_weather_tip: Wear comfortable clothes for travel. The bus might be air-conditioned, so a light jacket is useful.
itinerary.evening_summary: Board your overnight bus, settling in for a comfortable ride to the coastal town of Gokarna.
itinerary.morning_summary: Enjoy a relaxed morning in Hampi, perhaps revisiting a favorite spot or exploring Anegundi.
itinerary.notes: Ensure your phone is charged for navigation and communication. Keep valuables secure during the bus journey.

accommodation.booking_tip: Book a private room or dorm bed well in advance, especially during weekends or peak season, as it's very popular.
accommodation.name: Zostel Gokarna
accommodation.why_this: Offers a vibrant social atmosphere, clean facilities, and is strategically located near Kudle Beach, perfect for budget travelers.

activities.activity: Arrival at Gokarna & Transfer to Guesthouse
activities.description: Arrive at Gokarna Bus Stand. Take an auto-rickshaw to your guesthouse near Kudle Beach or Gokarna town, check in, and freshen up.
activities.google_maps_search_query: Gokarna Bus Stand, Gokarna, Karnataka, India
activities.how_to_reach: Auto-rickshaw from Gokarna Bus Stand — ₹150, 15 min.
activities.local_secret: Many guesthouses offer early check-in. Negotiate auto fares; aim for ₹100-150 to Kudle Beach.
activities.tips: Have your guesthouse address handy. Small change for auto-rickshaw is useful.
activities.why_this_fits: Smooth arrival and check-in allow for immediate immersion into Gokarna's relaxed coastal vibe, aligning with your interest in nature and temples.

activities.description: Visit the ancient Mahabaleshwar Temple, a revered Hindu pilgrimage site dedicated to Lord Shiva, known for its Dravidian architecture and spiritual ambiance.
activities.how_to_reach: Walk from Gokarna town — ₹0, 10 min. If staying near Kudle, auto-rickshaw — ₹80, 10 min.
activities.local_secret: Dress conservatively (shoulders and knees covered). Men might need to remove their shirts before entering the inner sanctum. Visit early to avoid crowds.
activities.tips: No photography inside the main temple. Be respectful of religious customs.
activities.why_this_fits: This ancient temple is a significant pilgrimage site, perfectly aligning with your interest in temples and offering a deep cultural experience.

activities.description: Enjoy a delicious and affordable South Indian thali or fresh seafood at Prema Restaurant, a popular spot in Gokarna town known for its quality and value.
activities.how_to_reach: Walk from Mahabaleshwar Temple — ₹0, 5 min.
activities.local_secret: Their filter coffee is a must-try. They also offer excellent fresh fruit juices. Try the local fish curry.
activities.tips: It can get crowded during peak lunch hours. Service is quick and efficient.
activities.why_this_fits: A budget-friendly and authentic culinary experience, providing local flavors and fresh ingredients to fuel your beach and temple explorations.

activities.description: Spend the afternoon relaxing, swimming, and soaking up the sun at Gokarna Beach, followed by a leisurely stroll to the more serene Kudle Beach, known for its crescent shape.
activities.how_to_reach: Walk from Gokarna town to Gokarna Beach — ₹0, 10 min. Walk from Gokarna Beach to Kudle Beach — ₹0, 20 min.
activities.local_secret: Kudle Beach is generally cleaner and less crowded than Gokarna Beach. Find a quiet spot and enjoy the tranquility. Many shacks offer sunbeds.
activities.tips: Be mindful of strong currents while swimming. Carry your own towel and water.
activities.why_this_fits: Perfect for nature lovers, offering pristine beaches for relaxation and swimming, allowing you to unwind and enjoy the coastal environment.

activities.description: Witness a spectacular sunset from Om Beach, followed by a delightful dinner at Namaste Cafe, famous for its beachside ambiance and fresh seafood.
activities.google_maps_search_query: Namaste Cafe, Om Beach, Gokarna, Karnataka, India
activities.how_to_reach: Auto-rickshaw from Kudle Beach — ₹100, 10 min.
activities.local_secret: Arrive early to grab a good spot for sunset viewing. Try their wood-fired pizzas or fresh catch of the day. They have good vegetarian options too.
activities.tips: The path to Om Beach can be dark after sunset, so carry a flashlight.
activities.why_this_fits: Combines your love for nature with a relaxing evening by the sea, offering stunning views and a delicious, budget-friendly meal.

itinerary.afternoon_summary: Relax and swim at the popular Gokarna Beach and Kudle Beach.
itinerary.daily_weather_tip: Expect warm, humid coastal weather. Light clothing, swimwear, and flip-flops are ideal.
itinerary.evening_summary: Enjoy a beautiful sunset and a fresh seafood dinner by the beach.
itinerary.morning_summary: Arrive in Gokarna, check into your guesthouse, and visit the revered Mahabaleshwar Temple.
itinerary.notes: Remember to carry a small bag for your beach essentials and valuables. Stay hydrated.

accommodation.booking_tip: Confirm your booking for the second night. Consider extending if you wish to enjoy more of Gokarna's relaxed vibe.
accommodation.name: Zostel Gokarna
accommodation.why_this: Continuing your stay at a well-regarded hostel ensures comfort and convenience for your final night in Gokarna.

activities.activity: Beach Trek: Om Beach to Paradise Beach
activities.description: Embark on a scenic coastal trek starting from Om Beach, continuing to Half Moon Beach, and finally reaching the secluded Paradise Beach. Enjoy the pristine nature and breathtaking views.
activities.how_to_reach: Walk from Zostel to Om Beach — ₹0, 15 min. (or auto ₹80, 5 min).
activities.local_secret: The path can be rocky; wear sturdy footwear. Carry snacks and water as facilities are limited on Half Moon and Paradise Beach. You can take a boat back from Paradise Beach if tired (₹200-300).
activities.tips: Start early to avoid the midday sun. Inform someone of your trekking plans.
activities.why_this_fits: This trek is a highlight for nature lovers, offering stunning coastal landscapes, hidden coves, and a sense of adventure, perfectly aligning with your interest in nature.

activities.activity: Lunch at a Beach Shack on Paradise Beach
activities.description: Enjoy a simple, fresh lunch at one of the rustic beach shacks on Paradise Beach, offering local snacks and refreshing drinks amidst serene natural surroundings.
activities.how_to_reach: On Paradise Beach (end of trek).
activities.local_secret: Options are basic but fresh. Try the local fruit salad or a simple fried fish. Cash is essential here.
activities.tips: Be prepared for limited choices. Enjoy the quiet ambiance.
activities.why_this_fits: A unique and budget-friendly dining experience directly on a secluded beach, allowing you to fully immerse yourself in Gokarna's natural beauty.

activities.description: Embark on a boat trip from Gokarna Beach or Om Beach to spot playful dolphins in their natural habitat. Enjoy the coastal views from the sea.
activities.how_to_reach: Boat from Paradise Beach to Om Beach (₹250), then auto-rickshaw to Gokarna Beach (₹100) — ₹350, 30 min.
activities.local_secret: Ask local fishermen or boat operators at Om Beach or Gokarna Beach. Prices are negotiable, especially if you join a group. Best chances for spotting dolphins are early morning or late afternoon.
activities.tips: Carry a camera with a good zoom lens. Be patient, as dolphin sightings are not guaranteed.
activities.why_this_fits: An exciting nature-focused activity that offers a chance to see marine wildlife and enjoy the scenic beauty of Gokarna's coastline from a different perspective.

activities.description: Stroll through Gokarna's main street market, browsing for souvenirs, local crafts, and spices. Enjoy a final budget-friendly dinner at a local eatery.
activities.google_maps_search_query: Gokarna Main Street, Gokarna, Karnataka, India
activities.how_to_reach: Walk from Gokarna Beach — ₹0, 5 min.
activities.local_secret: Bargain politely for better prices. Look for unique shell crafts, spiritual items, and local spices. Try a 'Gokarna special thali' for dinner.
activities.tips: Be aware of your surroundings in crowded market areas. Try local sweets.
activities.why_this_fits: A cultural experience that allows you to interact with local vendors and find unique souvenirs, while enjoying authentic local cuisine on a budget.

itinerary.afternoon_summary: Enjoy swimming and relaxation at these pristine natural coves.
itinerary.daily_weather_tip: Wear comfortable trekking sandals or shoes. Carry plenty of water and sun protection.
itinerary.evening_summary: Explore Gokarna town's local market and enjoy a final coastal dinner.
itinerary.morning_summary: Embark on a scenic trek to discover Gokarna's secluded beaches: Half Moon and Paradise Beach.
itinerary.notes: This day involves a fair amount of walking; ensure you are well-rested and hydrated. Keep your phone charged for photos.

accommodation.booking_tip: Book AC Sleeper bus tickets online via RedBus or MakeMyTrip at least 3-4 weeks in advance.
accommodation.name: Overnight Bus
accommodation.why_this: Saves a night's accommodation cost and efficiently covers the distance back to Bangalore.

activities.activity: Morning Swim at Kudle Beach & Breakfast
activities.description: Enjoy a final refreshing swim at Kudle Beach, followed by a leisurely breakfast at a beachside shack, savoring the last moments of coastal tranquility.
activities.how_to_reach: Walk from Zostel Gokarna — ₹0, 5 min.
activities.local_secret: Many shacks offer delicious and affordable breakfast options like pancakes, omelets, and fresh fruit. Enjoy the peaceful morning ambiance.
activities.tips: Check out from your accommodation before heading to the beach. Keep your luggage securely stored.
activities.why_this_fits: A relaxing end to your coastal exploration, allowing you to enjoy the natural beauty of Gokarna one last time before your journey home.

activities.description: Have a final lunch at Downtown Cafe, a popular spot in Gokarna town offering a variety of cuisines at budget-friendly prices.
activities.how_to_reach: Auto-rickshaw from Kudle Beach — ₹80, 10 min.
activities.local_secret: Their sandwiches and wraps are great for a quick, satisfying meal. They also have good coffee.
activities.tips: Confirm bus departure details while having lunch.
activities.why_this_fits: A convenient and affordable option for your last meal, ensuring you are well-fed before your long journey back to Bangalore.

activities.description: Board your pre-booked AC sleeper bus from Gokarna Bus Stand for your overnight journey back to Bangalore.
activities.google_maps_search_query: Gokarna Bus Stand, Gokarna, Karnataka, India
activities.how_to_reach: Auto-rickshaw from Downtown Cafe to Gokarna Bus Stand — ₹80, 10 min.
activities.local_secret: Choose a reputable bus operator like VRL Travels or SRS Travels for better comfort and reliability. Carry a neck pillow for added comfort.
activities.tips: Keep your bus ticket (e-ticket or printout) handy. Confirm your boarding point with the bus operator.
activities.why_this_fits: This overnight bus journey is a practical and budget-conscious way to return, saving on accommodation and maximizing your travel time.

itinerary.afternoon_summary: Prepare for your overnight journey back to Bangalore.
itinerary.daily_weather_tip: Dress comfortably for travel. A light jacket might be useful for the AC bus.
itinerary.evening_summary: Board your overnight bus, reflecting on your incredible budget adventure.
itinerary.morning_summary: Enjoy a final relaxed morning in Gokarna, perhaps with a last beach visit or souvenir shopping.
itinerary.notes: Ensure all your belongings are packed. Reflect on the amazing memories created during your trip.

money_saving_hacks: Eat at local dhabas and street food stalls for authentic, cheap meals (thalis, dosas, idlis).
Opt for state-run buses or shared auto-rickshaws for intra-city transport whenever possible.
Carry a water filter bottle or purification tablets to avoid buying bottled water.
Choose guesthouses/hostels that offer complimentary breakfast.
Negotiate prices for auto-rickshaws and non-metered services before starting the ride.
Utilize free attractions like beaches, viewpoints, and many smaller temples.
overall_vibe: You will immerse yourself in ancient history and serene coastal beauty. This journey invites you to explore magnificent temples carved from stone and unwind on pristine beaches, all while experiencing the vibrant local culture on a budget. Prepare for an authentic Indian adventure where every rupee brings a new discovery.
packing_tips: Lightweight, breathable cotton clothes suitable for hot and humid weather.
Comfortable walking shoes or sturdy sandals for Hampi's terrain and Gokarna's treks.
Sunscreen (high SPF), wide-brimmed hat, and sunglasses.
Reusable water bottle to stay hydrated and reduce plastic waste.
Small backpack for day trips and essentials.
Power bank for charging electronics, especially during travel.
Basic first-aid kit with pain relievers, band-aids, and insect repellent.
Light shawl or scarf for temple visits and cooler evenings.
smart_insights: Book overnight train/bus tickets 30-60 days in advance, especially for sleeper class, as they sell out fast.
Hampi is best explored early mornings or late afternoons to avoid peak heat and crowds.
Carry sufficient cash in Hampi as many smaller establishments do not accept digital payments.
Gokarna's beaches are best reached by scooter or trekking; autos can be expensive for multiple trips.
Pack light, breathable clothing suitable for hot weather and comfortable walking shoes.

travel_between_cities.tips: Book Sleeper Class (SL) for budget travel. Carry a light blanket and lock your luggage.
Choose an AC Sleeper bus for comfort. Confirm boarding point with operator.
Book an AC Sleeper bus. Arrive at the bus stand 30 minutes early.

trip_title: Karnataka's Ancient Echoes & Coastal Serenity: Hampi & Gokarna Budget Adventure
validation_warnings: Great news! Estimated cost ₹23,350 is 6.6% under your ₹25,000 budget. Consider adding an extra experience or upgrading accommodation.

Some activities may have generic names (e.g.: Virupaksha Temple, Lunch at Mango Tree Restaurant, Lunch at Gopi Guesthouse & Restaurant). For more specific recommendations, try providing more detailed preferences.
Note: Individual day costs sum to ₹15,000, which differs from the stated total of ₹23,350. Transport between cities may account for this difference.
